description:
Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Team names and logos in this app are used solely for identification purposes. Neither the EPL nor any EPL club endorses or is associated with this application. 

By using this app, you agree to Apple’s standard End User License Agreement (EULA):

Tudo Football brings the excitement of football to your fingertips with real-time match updates, detailed statistics, player insights and curated news - all in one place. Whether you're a casual fan or a passionate follower. Tudo Football is your all-access pass to the world of football.

Stay updated with live scores, upcoming fixtures, and results from global tournaments. Dive into detailed match pages with live status, kickoff times, team formations and referees. Explore head-to-head stats, team performance and full league standings - updated in real time.

Discover rich player profiles including age, nationality, physical stats, career information and performance metrics. Check out complete team pages with squad listings, clean sheets, yellow cards, goals and more.

Tudo Football also delivers trending news and match previews, keeping you in the loop on all the major headlines, analysis and transfer buzz.

Tudo Football Key Features:

* Live scores and match updates.
* Full match details: venue, schedule, lineup, broadcast info.
* League standings, fixtures, and stats.
* Team overviews with player rosters and performance metrics.
* Player profiles with detailed bio and career data.
* Real-time stats for goals, assists, cards, and more.
* Curated football news and trending stories.

Built with a clean, modern design, Tudo Football ensures a fast and fluid experience. With intuitive navigation and organized tabs, finding what you need has never been easier.

Download Tudo Football and take your football experience to the next level - wherever you are.

With over 20M active users and more than 2K competitions worldwide, you’ll have everything at your fingertips: live minute-by-minute match updates, personalised notifications for your favourite competitions, teams, and players, detailed stats, goals and the latest football news on transfers and the football market.

Don't miss a single match of the Premier League 2025/26 and UEFA Champions League seasons. Get all the live score, goals, stats, and news in our football app.

>> WITH BESOCCER: FOOTBALL LIVE SCORE
• Check today’s match schedules and football results.
• Find out where to watch the matches live.
• Stay connected with direct notifications for the latest news, standout players, teams, and transfer market updates.
• Share your opinions live during matches and on the latest news with our active user community.
• Live analysis and predictions of match results.
• Detailed statistics of each player, team or competition. 
• Images and video summaries of matches, teams or your favourite players.
• Navigate a simple, user-friendly interface with a sleek design.
• New audio commentaries on live matches.

>> CHECK LIVE SCORES, STATS & STANDINGS
Follow football from all over the world, including men’s and women’s competitions:
- Premier League, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and other top leagues.
- UEFA Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, Carabao Cup.
- Intercontinental Cup, UEFA Nations League, and many more!

>> ALL THE LATEST FOOTBALL AND TRANSFER MARKET NEWS
Check out all the latest football news and stay up to date on every move:
- Follow confirmed signings and transfer rumours.
- Discover which players are on the radar of Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern, PSG and other top European clubs.
- Find out which stars Liverpool, Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Manchester City are targeting.

>> FULL FOOTBALL FIXTURE SCHEDULES
Get match times for today’s games and upcoming key fixtures. Check past and future matchdays, where to watch the matches live, and stay updated with the latest news.

>>PROBABLES LINEUPS
See all the probables and confirmed lineups for the match live, along with each player´s performance and ratings.

>> SEARCH EVERYTHING YOU NEED INSTANTLY
Use our powerful search engine to find all the data you need on players, teams, and competitions:
- Who has scored more goals: Haaland or Mbappé?
- Who has won more titles: Messi or Cristiano?
- How many goals has Harry Kane scored?
- Which teams have the most league titles? Man City, Man United or Liverpool?
- Who won the last Ballon d’Or?

>> CUSTOMISE THE APP YOUR WAY
Set up the app to match your preferences and receive live notifications for your favourite teams, players, and competitions:
- Live match goals, results, and standings.
- Probable and confirmed line-ups.
- News, signings, and transfer rumours.

----------
Your feedback helps us improve every day!
We constantly enhance the app based on user suggestions and comments.

If your favourite league, team, or player is missing, let us know, and we’ll add them! BeSoccer is made for football lovers like you!

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Whether you're following the English Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, or any other major competition, Fiirso Hada is your go-to source for everything football.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

New features:
· In Player Info, The biggest-ever update to stats makes it easier to find players' records in every game they played and theirs market values in the different period. N
· In Club Info, users can browse thousands of clubs' ranking changes throughout the years around world. Users can also check every coaches' winning rates in a club's history.
More than 20m downloads from over 150 countries! Top 10 in 98+ countries! 
※ Main Features of All Football
Football News, Live Scores, Match Details, Chatroom, Transfer News, Videos & Highlights, Professional Stats, etc.

“All Football” app provides you with the latest and comprehensive football news, live scores, match videos and highlights. With “All Football” app, you can follow your favorite teams and players, get live scores and results from all the matches and competitions as well as the latest Football news all around the world. Everything you need to know about football, all at your fingertips.
Here’s the description of the main Features of “All Football”.

- Football news 
Our app provides you with the latest football news all around the world. You can also acquire personalized content based on teams you support like Real Madrid, FC Barcelona, Manchester united, Chelsea, Liverpool, Crystal Palace, Everton, Dortmund, and your favorite players like Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, David Villa, Kaka, etc. With our app you will not miss any news about the team you support or your favorite football star.

- Match Live 
You can get live scores about all the football matches for all the leagues and competitions, including MLS, Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League and so on.

- Match Details
Live text commentary, team line-ups, match analysis and betting odds… All in our Match Centre. You can also view on-the-spot scene in GIFs. Follow matches you’re interested in and get instant push notifications about goals and all other match events.

-Chatroom
You can interact with other users while enjoying our text LIVE. Share your happiness on football and make friends here!

- Transfer window
Our app offers you the latest transfer news. You can check all the official transfers and rumours about MLS and Europe’s Top 5 leagues in our Transfer window. 

- Professional Stats 
Get the tables, fixtures, results, squad, player profiles and performance stats on “All Football” app.

 “All Football” app is the most professional football app for football fans to follow all the leagues and competitions. If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us. We fully appreciate your kindly advice and will reply you ASAP.

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.
